message: (bunch of mixed case-ness and characters that require fingers bouncing on the shift keys every other character)
(the lazy part is that most of our branches have stupid characters in them, and it annoys me when I have to write those same characters over and over)
but still being able to merge other branches if I specify the branch name
any chance this is built in?
I want to be able to merge in changes from a branch that my current branch is tracking by just typing git merge
do you have git autocompletion installed?  That can help with typing long branch names
@ptone hooray for being even more lazy!
@ptone I do not, but I will look into it! thank you!
